text: I recently got [[Drummer]] to work reasonably well on a tablet like an iPad. But I'm thinking about doing something different for phones. I wonder if you think any note-taking tool on a phone is doing a particularly great job. Just the right size. Not too complicated. Easy to make notes, easy to refer to notes. If so, could you post a screen shot here. BTW -- I don't insist on doing this app. In fact I'd prefer not to.
